column1:
AndreasL,"2022-12-25T15:26:30.09Z"," Nice Christmas ornament","

Overview and Price
This ornament set can/could be purchased from the LEGO Shop VIP bonus center
column2: during the Christmas period of 2022. I paid 1200 VIP points for the set.

column1: The ornament is a garland / bunting banner. It consists of a string of 160 cm length with 13 attachments. The attachments are LEGO related shapes or figures
column2: made from a resilient paper material.&nbsp
column3: The figures are surprisingly large measuring&nbsp

column2: figures are only printed on one side. This makes it necessary to hang the garland on a wall, cupboard or similar where only the front is visible.

column1: The order and position of the figures may be swapped around to match your taste.
The Holiday Bunting set is delivered in a bag and not a box meaning it is probably wise to find a sturdy box for storage
column2: between Christmas seasons in order to protect the bendable paper figures.

column1: Overall, I think the set is good value for the VIP points spent. The garland
column2: looks very nice and is a colourful and decorative ornament to put up next to your other Christmas decorations.
